column1: the facts of this application, it is clear that the following matters must be satisfied for
the disqualification in Article 89(d) to apply to the Petitioner:

column3: The Petitioner must be serving a sentence of imprisonment;
Such term of imprisonment must not be less than six months;
The said sentence must be imposed after conviction by any Court;
The said sentence must be imposed in respect of an offence;
The  said  sentence  must  be  imposed  in  respect  of  an  offence  punishable  with
imprisonment for a term not less than two years.
